divs: Sighting DetailsIt dropped out of the sky and suddendly stopped, emitted a huge ring of fire while stopped, stopped again 100ft(fast) , and the ring of fire came back on. Object had no fire while dropping (decending). Dropped twice, ring of fire 3 times.... Never seen it coming or leaving....appeared to be hollow in the centered, no noise, no smoke, duration of the whole sighing ...2seconds....
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hallandale Beach
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
